intro: Paris polyphylla f. macrosepala, commonly known as the giant flame lily, is a rare and striking plant native to the Himalayas. It belongs to the family Melanthiaceae and is characterized by its large, showy white and red flowers. The plant features a short, thick rhizome and possesses a complex system of underground stems.
